sentences.english: A nanosecond is one-billionth of a second.
It cost two billion dollars to build this building.
sentences.chinese: 盖这大楼花了二十亿元。

sentences.english: The prospect of billion-year storage is fascinating and a little terrifying.
sentences.chinese: 数据储存数十亿年的愿景令人着迷却又有点可怕。

sentences.english: Billions of young people want to move beyond the shackles of poverty and conflict.
sentences.chinese: 数十亿年轻人想摆脱贫困和冲突的镣铐。

sentences.english: All the panes of glass in the world today cover about four billion square metres.
sentences.chinese: 如今全世界所有玻璃板总计约有四十亿平方米。

sentences.english: This progress is the product of hard work and ingenuity multiplied across billions of individual lives.
sentences.chinese: 这种进步是数十亿人勤奋努力和创新的结晶。

sentences.english: Forget about throwing billions more of taxpayer money at Motown.
sentences.chinese: 别再打算拿几十亿纳税人血汗钱往汽车城打水漂了。

sentences.english: The company spend billions on souped-up broadband services.
sentences.chinese: 公司投资数十亿用来提高宽带网的服务质量。

sentences.english: Billions of dollars are wagered each year on football in this country.
sentences.chinese: 数十亿美元，每年投注足球在这个国家。

sentences.english: The government has committed billions toward defraying the costs of the war.
sentences.chinese: 政府已承诺拨款数十亿支付战争的开支。

sentences.english: The projects, commonly known as earmarks, cost billions of dollars.
sentences.chinese: 这些俗称专项拨款的项目会耗费数十亿美元。

sentences.english: Negotiations have to start at $1 billion.
sentences.chinese: 谈判必须从十亿美元开始。
它是一个产值十亿美元的产业。

sentences.english: Farmers and poultry producers have lost billions of dollars as a result.
sentences.chinese: 农牧民和家禽饲养商因此蒙受了数十亿美元的损失。

sentences.english: In this world, there are seventy two billion Bodhisattvas.
sentences.chinese: 于此世界，有七百二十亿菩萨。

sentences.english: Billions of queries stream across the servers of these Internet services-the aggregate thought stream of humankind, online.
sentences.chinese: 人类通过网上的服务器进行十亿多条查询服务。

definition: over one billion/more than a billion
over ten thousand/fig. untold numbers/innumerable/thousands upon thousands
